Claim: "A small girl is playing electronic drum pads with sticks."
Referring expressions: Small girl, electronic drum pads, sticks.  Girl, electronic drums
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsSmall(a) and IsPlaying(a) and HasSticks(c))) & (forall f (forall g ( IsPlaying(f) ->  IsSmall(g))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsPlaying(d) and HasElectronicDrums(e))))
